19 
33 EXPORT_SYMBOL
34 struct icmphdr *nfq_icmp_get_hdr(struct pkt_buff *pktb)
35 {
36  if (pktb->transport_header == NULL)
37  return NULL;
38 
39  /* No room for the ICMP header. */
40  if (pktb_tail(pktb) - pktb->transport_header < sizeof(struct icmphdr))
41  return NULL;
42 
43  return (struct icmphdr *)pktb->transport_header;
44 }
